details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.7.3 Version identification - PDF/A Identification Schema.
details.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema. The PDF/A Identification schema defined in Table 2 uses the namespace URI "http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/"

rule.description: The PDF/A version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/A Identification extension schema. The PDF/A Identification schema defined in Table 2 uses the namespace URI "http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/"

error.message: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/A Identification Schema
